column3: “Doesn't look like it is all that, But it kicks your a#$. Smell is pungent and brings memories of the good ol days. Highly potent. Stay at home and enjoy !”

“Frank hits you hard when smoked. Will have you full of laughter (controllable) and in the mood to be creative with things. The taste is a bit sweet and tropical mix and can put insomniacs to sleep at ease.”

“Smells pleasant, hint of spiciness in the flavor. Pretty intense effects almost immediately, im having trouble writing this because i just want to sit on the couch. I should have grabbed snacks. Damn”

“Amazing strain with heavy indica traits! Love it, not much of a sativa person it gives me anxiety. Super relaxing, taste very earthy, great pain reliever! One of my new favorites! If your looking for a heavy hitter that you can still be social with this is it! Love it!”
“It was too strong for me and knocked me the f#¢k out but it did wonders for my sleeping problem.”

“Frankenstein lives up to its bio. A very powerful indica and the first strain to induce the best laughing fits for myself. This strain is an excellent addition to relaxing with friends and a great way to end any day.”

“Tried this strain on a whim because the local delivery service had a g for $20 (wax). I smoke from a YoCan Evolve Plus.  I'm a daily medicator, and usually smoke Indicas. 

This strain is definitely a hard hitting Indica.  You'll feel the couch lock almost immediately, but it's also a heady high. I experience a sharpness of focus, and find myself, for some reason,  interested in learning new things.  Hell, I just spe...”

“What day is it? Who cares! This strain is incredibly relaxing and promises a great full body high. This strain is what every stoner expects to find someday. Something to make you say night-night. I find this flower easy to smoke, with a classic scent. If you are looking for something to promote relaxation and pain relief, this is the strain for you. A little goes a long way though.”
“This lovely Indica has a well established mood when inhaled Come Smoke me and let me take you on an adventure"

column1: What it's really saying is Don't overdue it with me Cuz I'm a potent Bitch that will take your brain on a joyride that will leave you in Slumberland”"

column3: “What day is it? Who cares! This strain is incredibly relaxing and promises a great full body high. This strain is what every stoner expects to find someday. Something to make you say night-night. I find this flower easy to smoke, with a classic scent. If you are looking for something to promote relaxation and pain relief, this is the strain for you. A little goes a long way though.”

“I recommend this strain for me. Frankenstein by the high point is sedative, extremely relaxed, slightly happy and euphoric. Smoke has near to no lung expansion. Very smooth taste of flowers with a hint of berries and honey. Buds are dense with good amount of trich. Deep purple to light beige nugs with massive amounts of stubby fat copper hairs. It’s great for treating anxiety.

I will get again.”
“Definitely love this strain! First time smoking it, flower, dense dark and red hair nugs, had me giggling for a bit and now super cough lock chilling bro. Peace J$ ✌️”

“One of my favorite strains, deep relaxation that helps me do anything from just calm down to pass the fuck out. Recommend to anyone with any sort of sleeping, muscular or emotional issues like anxiety snd anger issues”
“I'd suggest only smoking this one when you plan on going to bed within 2hrs because no matter what you want it will put you to sleep!”
“My new favorite night time strain.”

“I liked this relativity potent indica. It has a nice floral and earthy aroma. It makes you feel relaxed and content. It's great for chilling out at home in the evening or on the weekend. I'd buy it again.”
“We call him faithful Frank! He never lets you down and he's even better in concentrate form!”

“I liked this relativity potent indica. It has a nice floral and earthy aroma. It makes you feel relaxed and content. It's great for chilling out at home in the evening or on the weekend. I'd buy it again.”
“great”

“Like sugar, sticky indica heavy strain that is some of the most relaxing medication I've ever had. They should call it valium or xanax. So relaxed right now, nothing weighing on my mind but Im still able to hold a conversation and be focused just fine. Not overstimulated concentration, more 'I could care less right now' feeling. Good stuff”
“Just like Grandma's Boy! Good job, Doc!”

“Frankenstein. The buds are dense and are coated in good ole Trichomes. The high is a very calming high and can start some funny convos lol but when mixed with GSC & Blue Dream you really feel like you're in a dream like state”
“Love smoking a couple bowls of this right before bed.”
“Actually a good strain to sleep peacefully. Has a smell sweeter than Britney Spears' s perfumes, with a clear mango scent.”
“We call him faithful Frank! He never lets you down and he's even better in concentrate form!”
“Actually a good strain to sleep peacefully. Has a smell sweeter than Britney Spears' s perfumes, with a clear mango scent.”
“Just like Grandma's Boy! Good job, Doc!”

“Like sugar, sticky indica heavy strain that is some of the most relaxing medication I've ever had. They should call it valium or xanax. So relaxed right now, nothing weighing on my mind but Im still able to hold a conversation and be focused just fine. Not overstimulated concentration, more 'I could care less right now' feeling. Good stuff”

“I absolutely love this strain. It makes me feel like a monster in the best way possible. It was a heavy, fast-hitting high, but I was still able to focus on any task at hand. I was not sedated or couch-locked with this indica, but it still offered a relaxing, pain-relieving effect.”
“Not a largely producing plant but nice purple buds with good taste.”
“Took a binger of this stuff and omg I'm cheesed straight smiley high stuck on the couch watching south park. get you some asap”
“Perfect for chilling out, relaxing, nausea, and insomnia.”

“Frankenstein a kickass indica for a relaxing, casual, nighttime smoke sesh. 
The first time I really smoked a lot of this strain (~4 blunts) was while I was camping with a friend of mine. We smoked this around noon, immediately gorged ourselves on beef jerky and donuts, then napped. The head-high I experienced while dozing was so intense I actually stepped outside to lay down on the ground in the rain. My head and ey...”
“This weed taste SOOOO good, super earthy. I love it. VERY RELAXING like i’m just chilling listen to Mac Miller. It’s nice. I highly recommend it. ENJOY!!! <3333”

“my friend’s granddad just brought her some Frankenstein wax from Seattle a couple days ago and we smoked some last night..👌🏽. Very potent and relaxing. we ended up watching American Horror Story when we got to her house and just chilled out, it did make me feel a tad anxious just cuz it was a creepy vibe but with our snacks it was still pretty chill. highly recommend”
“Loaded some of this flower into a peach blunt and the high was astounding. My high tolerance didn't stand a chance.”
“Took a binger of this stuff and omg I'm cheesed straight smiley high stuck on the couch watching south park. get you some asap”
“Used my vaporizer and puts me to sleep every time. Definitely a hard hitter”
“Earthy-Pine and smooth smoke with a fruity aftertaste. On the stoney side, but not couch lock. Good for body aches and turning that frown upside down. Peace”
“Just now put little bud in my Keurig coffee cup thing that coffee was in @ 1655”

“one of my favorite strands. great for relaxing and getting rid of stress. has wicked dry mouth but the high is so worth it. I normally end up hallucinating after 1 bowl so it can lead to some good times”
“Perfect for chilling out, relaxing, nausea, and insomnia.”
“Not a largely producing plant but nice purple buds with good taste.”

“I absolutely love this strain. It makes me feel like a monster in the best way possible. It was a heavy, fast-hitting high, but I was still able to focus on any task at hand. I was not sedated or couch-locked with this indica, but it still offered a relaxing, pain-relieving effect.”
“gave me a dog ass headache but great high it gives off”

“At first it was a blast.  Mixed effects:  laughter, relaxed, silly.  Felt like I needed to go to a dance club or something.  Then stage 2 hit - BAM!  Dizzy and nausea.  I vaped and wife smoked.  She had the same effect.  Wondering if I had a bad batch.”

“Wow. Registered an account just to rate this strain. One of the best Indica's I have ever had. I primarily use Indica's and prefer them sativa strains, and as mentioned above - this strain is pure insanity. It truly is able to push pass the ceiling of tolerance”
“one of my favorite very tasty and heavy high small yeid”
“Not a typical Indica. Seemed like more of a hybrid. Get a great flash of concentration and creativity then you come down easy. Good for some late afternoon management.”

“Well heres one of those mysterious strains that nobody knows what the counterparts are the parents are Rumored to be Maui Waui and a Pacific Northwest Indica that really overpowers the Sativa Dominant Maui Waui this strain is rumored again to be 80% indica which is hard to believe because of the nice creativeness and energy you get from the strain”

“Good indica to have before bed. This wasn't my favorite indica, hence the two stars, but it was good. My usual place had it $40 for 2g of wax, so I tried it because the price was right. Would I get it again? Probably not. Last resort, yes. Hit me hard and put me to sleep. Tastes just like mangoes!”
“Stopped MS tremors right away.”
“Nice strain. I have a high tolerance and got some lower-quality Frankenstein, but a small bit smoked still gives a nice, heavy Indica effect.”

“Holly molly this one was fun !!! This strain was one of the best Indica's I've had in a while. The buds were tight, with bright red hairs. The aroma was fruity and delicious. The smoke was smooth and the buzz was just as. This strain offered deep body relaxation, with a wonderful release of mind and body. Provided the relief I am always seeking. Much love for this one !”
“Smashed up buds and made muffins in freezer”
“ate at 0700 before leaving in DAV van”

“This is currently at the top of my list of favorites. Settles in nice with a lasting permagrin and then I want to grub out before I pass out. You will get the heavies but only after several hours of calming, yet somehow inspiring euphoria. A perfect strain for me to keep a smile on my mug and keep me at my art and eventually settle in to some good rest.”
“knock me the fuck out”
“this is awesome. it wont let you down. great for stress and pain”

“This indica left something to be desired for me personally.  I expected to be walking around like Ol' Frank himself but instead it wasn't the heavy hitter I had hoped for. Tolerance is relative so this one may be good for you. For reference, GDP is a personal favorite indica.”
“Dr. Frankenstein is the bomb! Fire it up, Doc!”
“great Strain. Strong and to the point. great laughs while playing videogames and mindgames.”
“Had a ko mode!”

“Got a gram of this to try at the Stash Box and let me tell you it so far it's doing a great job of bringing on relaxation and serenity, a release of pain and stiffness and can already see there should be no insomnia this evening. Giving it a preliminary thumbs up! 👍🏻”

“Oh Lord, what can I say about this strain? It tastes like shit. I don't know if it was the growers fault, or if it was because it was a pre-roll... But fuuuuucccckk man this weed was so bad I couldn't get passed 5 hits... It was like you were spraying smokey perfume into your mouth... Just ugh... :( I was highly disappointed because the THC level was so high and this grower is usually really good. 

However, the high...”
